short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The idea is that you buy sitting time with exercise. For every X repetitions you will get Y of minutes of sitting.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: We spend too much time sitting. Its bad for us and we will pay the price sooner or later. So why not pay the price sooner. By doing exercises you will gain minutes for sitting. That way you will remain active and get stronger by sitting.
